page.title: 14LIFESTYLES
page.content: It's Friday. I wake up at 7.45 & switch on the radio & listen to it until 8.15. Then I get dressed in my school clothes. At 8.20 I get my break -fast. I have a bowl of Sugar Puffs, a slice of toast and a cup of coffee. I have marmalade on my toast. After breakfast I go back upstairs to get washed & brush my hair. At 8.35 I go downstairs, put on my coat & shoes & pick up my bag. Then I say goobye to Mum and call for Cheryl Hewitt. Then Sharon & Emma come along & Cheryl's Mum drives us to school . At school we either go inside or play until the bell goes. Then we all storm into the classroom. When our teacher Mrs. Smith comes in we all quieten down. Mrs. Smith then marks the register & we go to the hall for assembly. The service is taken by Mr. Ord. Mrs. Fritsch plays the piano. After assembly we
